name: Successful selection of a payment gateway
scenarioId: get_payment_gateways:Successful selection of a payment gateway
methodName: Successful selection of a payment gateway

testSteps.description: Given that the user is on the payment page
When the user selects a payment gateway
Then the system should redirect or simulate the flow of the selected gateway

userStory.narrative:
As a user, I want to be able to select my preferred payment gateway when making my purchase,
  to ensure that I use my preferred payment method.

title: Successful selection of a payment gateway
